title: How to Treat Curly Leaf on Peach Trees

steps.title: Mix the Epsom salts in a little hot water to dissolve.
steps.content: Mix the Epsom salts in a little hot water to dissolve.

steps.title: Leave this to cool completely before using.
steps.content: Leave this to cool completely before using.

steps.title: Pour on the ground around the peach tree.
steps.content: Pour on the ground around the peach tree. Pour from the outside branch length (i.e. the drip line) to within 25 centimeter (9.8 in) of the tree trunk.

steps.title: Repeat two to three times a year.
steps.content: Repeat two to three times a year.
